name: EYE CATHCING BANNER GENERATOR
description:
One thing I've learned in my long career at a marketing agency is that people click on weird, ugly, and sometimes creepy banners. I made this banner generator to help anyone who doesn't know how marketing works.


In the package, you will find a banner generator for all standard sizes in Facebook ads. Yes, so far there is only one generator, but it will continue to be replenished with other types of conversion banners.


P.S. I know that these banners seem strange, but believe me, such a banner in advertising overnight can beat your expectations, but you should not use it often.
